desc.p: Name of the Table in which Select is performed.
: Minimum Characters allowed is 2 and Maximum Characters allowed is 35. Alphanumeric characters are allowed.
The ID of DAS.RESULTS is the ID of applications used in T24. As this is a concat file the ID is updated accordingly.

Details of the Select performed, specific to the table is updated in this field. For example:If the Select is performed in EB.LOOKUP for EB.SECURE.MESSAGE, this field will contain - TO.STATUS*READ, FROM.STATUS*SENT
Number of Select(s) performed is updated in this field.
Description of the Select Query, specific to the Table is updated in this field.
